column4: I have a question.. I recently installed Ubuntu but now when I try to ./configure my eggdrop, I get error: C compiler cannot create executables
but if you type tcl in a terminal it's found?
ii  tcl8.4                                     8.4.12-1.1                           Tcl (the Tool Command Language) v8.4 - run-t
Should I just try to remove it w/apt and install from source?
I think it's tclsh though, not tcl.
your source code sounds broken then
Its cool, ill try it from src :)
perhaps the program needs the headers
Thanks again for the help.. I just downloaded it from source and made it that way.. maybe its the package with apt
